roleset.name: make contact with, collide literally or metaphorically

role.descr: theme, thing in motion, 1st colliders or all colliders in one constituent
thing hit, 2nd collider where separate mention
Topic collided over in metaphorical case, cause of disagreement

example.name: transitive
example.text: According to astronomy experts , the observation and study of this comet colliding with Jupiter will help both the in - depth revelation of Jupiter 's mysteries of the rosy clouds , the great red spot , and corona and also help in developing research on the odds , forecast accuracy and explosive effects , etc . of comets and asteroids ' collision with Earth .

example.name: Arg 0, all colliders in one constituent.
example.text: The collision of the two ships resulted in a serious oil spill .

example.name: Metaphorical collision, same syntax
example.text: The collision of interests became clear during the meeting .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: My collision with Jessie over Operation Smile is an example ; I really wanted to help , even to the point of writing a letter to people in my school .

example.name: "Over" as LOC, literal collision
example.text: An important question regarding the collision over the Hudson is whether the pilot of the private plane had tuned in to the corridor frequency .

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Rolling Stone remarked that Size and his Reprazent collective " engineer the collision of style with stealth . "

roleset.note: COLLIDE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from collide.01-v)

COLLISION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry collide.01, OntoNotes grouping collision-n senses 1 & 2; maps to VN classes bump-18.4-1 and correspond-36.1, the latter of which is a metaphorical extension of the first. Framed by Claire. (from collision.01-n)
Verb entry does not have arg2, and it seems fairly rare, but it is predicted by VN. Hopefully an outside causer with two colliders doesn't come up...I could've just jinxed it. (from collision.01-n)
